column3: hwɛ
column5: eso wonketsie me ndze: na wɔbɛka dɛ

column3: Ebɛnadze na ɔdze wo nsamu no? Na ɔsee dɛ
Tow kyen famu. Na ɔtowee kyeen famu
column4: na ɔdaan abowatsena; na Moses fii n’enyim guanee."

column3: Tsen wo nsa
column4: na suo no dua mu: (na ɔtseen ne nsa suoo mu
column5: na ɔdaan poma wɔ ne nsamu:)"

column3: hɔn egyanom Nyankopɔn no

column2: "Na nkyii so EWURADZE see no dɛ
column3: Afei fa wo nsa hyɛ wo bo mu. Na ɔdze ne nsa hyɛɛ no bo mu: na oyii puei no
column5: nna ne nsa ho egu kwata fitaa dɛ esukwankyɛba."

column3: Fa wo nsa hyɛ wo bo mu bio. (Na ɔdze ne nsa hyɛɛ no bo mu bio; na oyii fii no bo mu no
column5: nna adan dɛ no honam ara bio.)"

column3: sɛ wɔanngye wo enndzi
column4: nkyii so woenntsie asɛnkyerɛdze a odzi kan no ne ndze a
column5: wɔbɛgye asɛnkyerɛdze a otsia ebien no ne ndze edzi."

column3: sɛ wɔanngye nsɛnkyerɛdze ebien yi mpo enndzi
column4: nkyii so woenntsie wo ndze a
column5: ɔno kɛsaw esutsen no mu nsu bi
column6: na hue gu asaase kɛsɛɛ do: na nsu a ebɛsaw no wɔ esutsen no mu no ɔbɛdan bɔgya wɔ asaase kɛsɛɛ no do."

column3: Ao
column7: ofitsi aber a ɔwo enye w’akowaa kasae yi o: osiandɛ m’ano yɛ dur

column3: Woana na ɔyɛɛ nyimpa ano? Anaa woana na ɔyɛ nyimpa mmum
column6: anaa onyifurafo? Ana nnyɛ emi EWURADZE bi a?"

column3: na mibedzi w’ano ekyir
Ao EWURADZE
column5: dua nyia woara epɛ dɛ esoma no

column2: "Na EWURADZE n’ebufuw dzɛɛw wɔ Moses do
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Ana wo nua Aaron Levinyi no nnyi hɔ bi a? Minyim dɛ obotum akasa yie. Na eso
column6: orifi edzi nye wo ebehyia: na sɛ ohu wo a

column3: na fa nsɛm no hyɛ n’ano: na mibedzi w’ano
column5: na makyerɛ hom dza hom nyɛ."

column2: "Na ɔbɛyɛ wo kyeame ama ɔman no: na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ ano ama wo
column4: na ɔwo aayɛ dɛ Nyankopɔn ama no."

column2: "Na fa poma yi a edze bɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze no kitsa wo nsamu."
"Na Moses sanee kɔr n’asew Jetro nkyɛn
column3: na ɔkɛsee no dɛ
column6: na mensan nkɔ mo nuanom a wɔwɔ Egypt no nkyɛn
column7: na monkɔhwɛ kyerɛ wɔda ho tse ase anaa. Na Jetro see Moses dɛ

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses wɔ Midian dɛ
column3: Kɔ
column4: san kɔ Egypt: na nyimpa a wɔhwehwɛ wo nkwa no nyinara ewuwu."

column2: "Na Moses faa ne yer nye ne mbabanyin no
column3: na ɔdze hɔn tsenatsenaa asoaso do
column4: na ɔsanee dɛ ɔrokɔ Egypt asaase do: na Moses faa Nyankopɔn no poma no kitsaa ne nsamu."

column3: Sɛ esan kɔ Egypt a
column4: hwɛ na anwanwadze a medze mahyɛ wo nsa no nyinara yɛ no wɔ Farao enyim: na mibepirim n’akoma

column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
Ma me ba nkɔ nkɔsom me; na ɔwo ammpen ma ɔannkɔ: hwɛ

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔkwan do asoɛe no
column3: EWURADZE hyiaa no
na ɔdze twaa ne babanyin no twatsia
column4: na ɔtowee kyeen Moses n’ananadze; na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Ampaara ɔwo yɛ bɔgya ho kun fofor dze ma me."

column2: "Na Ewuradze gyaa Moses. Na osian twatsiatwa no ntsi Zipora see dɛ
column3: Bɔgya ho kun fofor nye wo no."
Kɔ sar no do kehyia Moses. Na ɔkɔree
column4: kehyiaa no wɔ Nyankopɔn ne bepɔw no ho

column2: "Na Moses kaa nsɛm a EWURADZE dze somaa no no nyinara
column3: nye nsɛnkyerɛdze a ɔdze hyɛɛ no no nyinara kyerɛɛ Aaron."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron kɔree na wɔkɔboaboaa Israelmba mpanyimfo nyinara ano."
"Na Aaron kaa nsɛm a EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses no nyinara
column3: na ɔyɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze no wɔ ɔman no enyim."

column2: "Na ɔman no gyee dzii: na aber a wɔtsee dɛ EWURADZE abɛsera Israelmba
column3: na ɔahwɛ hɔn amandzehu no wɔbobɔɔ hɔn tsir adze na wɔsɔree."
